mcq.statement: Choose the correct sentence using the subjunctive mood: If she arrives early, we would be surprised If she is to arrive early, we would be surprised If she was to arrive early, we would be surprised

options.a: If she arrives early, we would be surprised
options.b: If she is to arrive early, we would be surprised
options.c: If she was to arrive early, we would be surprised
options.d: If she were to arrive early, we would be surprised
